children.custom:
<% var fixedCosts=0, wages=0, unworked=0, total=0, taskTotal=0, projectFixedCost = Y.Wegas.Facade.VariableDescriptor.cache.find('name', 'projectFixedCosts').getInstance().get('value'); for(var i=0; i 0) fixedCosts = fixedCosts + parseFloat(properties.fixedCosts); unworked = unworked + parseFloat(properties.unworkedHoursCosts); } taskTotal = wages + fixedCosts + unworked; total = taskTotal + projectFixedCost; %>
Project Fixed Costs<%= projectFixedCost %>
Tasks<%= taskTotal %>
- Wages<%= wages %>
- Fixed Costs<%= fixedCosts %>
- Unworked Hours<%= unworked %>
TOTAL<%= total %>
